thread.title: Beverly Hills welcomes India input

author: eTN Editor
title: Beverly Hills welcomes India input
text:
Beverly Hills welcomes India input Adv: 
By Anil Mathur, eTN India Correspondent | Jul 27, 2015 Julie Wagner, CEO of Beverly Hills Conference and Visitors Bureau Adv: 
Popular California tourist destination, Beverly Hills, appointed Sartha Global Marketing, led by Sheema Vohra, as the India Representative for the Beverly Hills Conference and Visitors Bureau. 
The famed area in the Los Angeles region of the US is very popular with film stars and celebrities providing hotels and shopping - things which Indians admire and look forward to. This is what Sartha will promote in India for Beverly Hills, Vohra said on being appointed as the rep. 
The CEO of the bureau, Julie Wagner, also said that Sartha has the right credentials and expertise to increase awareness and visitors from India to Beverly Hills.
